45.1.hd_quote: The ability to promote and develop gathering together through the education of the uncommitted.
45.1.behavioral_axis: Knows power = educate the people, then gather them.
45.1.shadow_axis: Overzealous promotion feels like proselytizing and repels the tribe.

45.2.hd_quote: Gathering together is strengthened by acknowledged common interest.
45.2.behavioral_axis: Projects, “I can lead you,” and cements it with shared material interests.
45.2.shadow_axis: Rejects others’ techniques; becomes the power-behind-the-throne controller.

45.3.hd_quote: The ability when excluded to take whatever measures are necessary to dissolve the antiquated form and to accept even humiliation to achieve inclusion.
keywords: will do anything to get to center
45.3.behavioral_axis: If barred from power, will find or force a way back in.
45.3.shadow_axis: Violent or reactive exclusion → tribal fracture.

45.4.hd_quote: The ability to focus the opportunity of gathering together for the service of higher principles.
45.4.behavioral_axis: Points the whole tribe’s resources at what truly benefits them.
45.4.shadow_axis: Uses group direction to advance private agenda.

45.5.hd_quote: All gathering must have a center and a focus.
45.5.behavioral_axis: Becomes the obvious material center; leads by educating and delegating.
45.5.shadow_axis: Assumes respect before it’s earned → appears aristocratic or entitled.

45.6.hd_quote: A material direction which serves the outsider; or a material direction that is focused on conditioning the outsider to conform.
45.6.behavioral_axis: Sees tribe must mutate by bringing in new blood/resources.
45.6.shadow_axis: Brings outsiders in then overcontrols to appease the tribe.
